Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
components.gameboard.GameBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionObserver, GameObserver, IncomingObserver
public class GameBoardController extends Object implements GameObserver, IncomingObserver, ConnectionObserver
Class holds controller for game board
